description:
Traited class [tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState]

EpileptorRestingState is an extension of the phenomenological neural mass model of partial seizures Epileptor [Jirsaetal_2014], tuned to express regionally specific physiological oscillations in addition to the epileptiform discharges. This extension was made using the Generic 2-dimensional Oscillator model (parametrized close to a supercritical Hopf Bifurcation) [SanzLeonetal_2013] to reproduce the spontaneous local field potential-like signal.

This model, its motivation and derivation can be found in the published article [Courtioletal_2020].

Variables of interest to be used by monitors: p * (-x_{1} + x_{2}) + (1 - p) * x_{rs}

ẋ1  =  y1 − f1(x1, x2) − z + Iext1       ẏ1  =  c − dx21 − y1       ż  =  ⎧⎨⎩ r(4(x1 − x0) − z − 0.1z7)   ifx < 0        r(4(x1 − x0) − z)  ifx ≥ 0        ẋ2  =   − y2 + x2 − x32 + Iext2 + b2g(x1) − 0.3(z − 3.5)       ẏ2  =  1 ⁄ τ( − y2 + f2(x2))       ġ  =   − 0.01(g − 0.1x1)       ẋrs  =  drsτrs( − frsx3rs + ersx2rs + αrsyrs + γrsIrs)       ẏrs  =  drs(brsxrs − βrsyrs + ars) ⁄ τrs
where:
f1(x1, x2) = ⎧⎨⎩ ax31 − bx21   if x1 < 0         − (slope − x2 + 0.6(z − 4)2)x1   if x1 ≥ 0 
and:
f2(x2) = ⎧⎨⎩ 0   if x2 <  − 0.25        a2(x2 + 0.25)   if x2 ≥  − 0.25 

Attributes declared

a : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.a = NArray(label='a', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coefficient of the cubic term in the first state-variable x1.
b : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.b = NArray(label='b', dtype=float64, default=array([3.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coefficient of the squared term in the first state-variable x1.
c : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.c = NArray(label='c', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Additive coefficient for the second state-variable y1, called :math:'y_{0}' in Jirsa et al. (2014).
d : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.d = NArray(label='d', dtype=float64, default=array([5.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coefficient of the squared term in the second state-variable y1.
r : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.r = NArray(label='r', dtype=float64, default=array([0.00035]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Temporal scaling in the third state-variable z, called :math:'1/ au_{0}' in Jirsa et al. (2014).
s : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.s = NArray(label='s', dtype=float64, default=array([4.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Linear coefficient in the third state-variable z.
x0 : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.x0 = NArray(label='x0', dtype=float64, default=array([-1.6]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Epileptogenicity parameter.
Iext : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.Iext = NArray(label='Iext', dtype=float64, default=array([3.1]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
External input current to the first population (x1, y1).
slope : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.slope = NArray(label='slope', dtype=float64, default=array([0.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Linear coefficient in the first state-variable x1.
Iext2 : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.Iext2 = NArray(label='Iext2', dtype=float64, default=array([0.45]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
External input current to the second population (x2, y2).
tau : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.tau = NArray(label='
tau', dtype=float64, default=array([10.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Temporal scaling coefficient in the fifth state-variable y2.
aa : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.aa = NArray(label='aa', dtype=float64, default=array([6.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Linear coefficient in the fifth state-variable y2.
bb : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.bb = NArray(label='bb', dtype=float64, default=array([2.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Linear coefficient of lowpass excitatory coupling in the fourth state-variable x2.
Kvf : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.Kvf = NArray(label='Kvf', dtype=float64, default=array([0.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coupling scaling on a very fast time scale.
Kf : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.Kf = NArray(label='Kf', dtype=float64, default=array([0.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coupling scaling on a fast time scale.
Ks : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.Ks = NArray(label='Ks', dtype=float64, default=array([0.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Permittivity coupling, that is from the very fast time scale toward the slow time scale.
tt : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.tt = NArray(label='tt', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Time scaling of the Epileptor.
tau_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.tau_rs = NArray(label='
taurs', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Temporal scaling coefficient in the third population (x_rs, y_rs).
I_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.I_rs = NArray(label='Irs', dtype=float64, default=array([0.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
External input current to the third population (x_rs, y_rs).
a_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.a_rs = NArray(label='ars', dtype=float64, default=array([-2.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Vertical shift of the configurable nullcline in the state-variable y_rs.
b_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.b_rs = NArray(label='brs', dtype=float64, default=array([-10.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Linear coefficient of the state-variable y_rs.
d_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.d_rs = NArray(label='drs', dtype=float64, default=array([0.02]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Temporal scaling of the whole third system (x_rs, y_rs).
e_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.e_rs = NArray(label='ers', dtype=float64, default=array([3.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coefficient of the squared term in the sixth state-variable x_rs.
f_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.f_rs = NArray(label='frs', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coefficient of the cubic term in the sixth state-variable x_rs.
alpha_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.alpha_rs = NArray(label='
alphars', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable y_rs to the fast variable x_rs.
beta_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.beta_rs = NArray(label='
betars', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable y_rs to itself.
gamma_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.gamma_rs = NArray(label='
gammars', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Constant parameter to reproduce FHN dynamics where excitatory input currents are negative. Note: It scales both I_rs and the long-range coupling term.
K_rs : tvb.simulator.models.epileptor_rs.EpileptorRestingState.K_rs = NArray(label='Krs', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Coupling scaling on a fast time scale.

Linear coefficient.

Typical bounds on state-variables in EpileptorRestingState model.

Quantities of EpileptorRestingState available to monitor.

gid : tvb.basic.neotraits._core.HasTraits.gid = Attr(field_type=<class 'uuid.UUID'>, default=None, required=True)

arguments.a: Coefficient of the cubic term in the first state-variable x1.
arguments.b: Coefficient of the squared term in the first state-variable x1.
arguments.c: Additive coefficient for the second state-variable y1, called :math:'y_{0}' in Jirsa et al. (2014).
arguments.d: Coefficient of the squared term in the second state-variable y1.
arguments.r: Temporal scaling in the third state-variable z, called :math:'1/ au_{0}' in Jirsa et al. (2014).
arguments.s: Linear coefficient in the third state-variable z.
arguments.Iext: External input current to the first population (x1, y1).
arguments.slope: Linear coefficient in the first state-variable x1.
arguments.Iext2: External input current to the second population (x2, y2).
arguments.tau: Temporal scaling coefficient in the fifth state-variable y2.
arguments.aa: Linear coefficient in the fifth state-variable y2.
arguments.bb: Linear coefficient of lowpass excitatory coupling in the fourth state-variable x2.
arguments.Kvf: Coupling scaling on a very fast time scale.
arguments.Kf: Coupling scaling on a fast time scale.
arguments.Ks: Permittivity coupling, that is from the very fast time scale toward the slow time scale.
arguments.tau_rs: Temporal scaling coefficient in the third population (x_rs, y_rs).
arguments.I_rs: External input current to the third population (x_rs, y_rs).
arguments.a_rs: Vertical shift of the configurable nullcline in the state-variable y_rs.
arguments.b_rs: Linear coefficient of the state-variable y_rs.
arguments.d_rs: Temporal scaling of the whole third system (x_rs, y_rs).
arguments.e_rs: Coefficient of the squared term in the sixth state-variable x_rs.
arguments.f_rs: Coefficient of the cubic term in the sixth state-variable x_rs.
arguments.alpha_rs: Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable y_rs to the fast variable x_rs.
arguments.beta_rs: Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable y_rs to itself.
arguments.gamma_rs: Constant parameter to reproduce FHN dynamics where excitatory input currents are negative. Note: It scales both I_rs and the long-range coupling term.
arguments.K_rs: Coupling scaling on a fast time scale.
arguments.state_variable_range: Typical bounds on state-variables in EpileptorRestingState model.
arguments.variables_of_interest: Quantities of EpileptorRestingState available to monitor.
